meanings.definition: The study of the chemical composition of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: Cosmochemistries involves analyzing the elements in stars and planets.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use cosmochemistries to understand what makes up the universe.
meanings.sent3: Learning about cosmochemistries can feel like exploring a cosmic treasure map.
meanings.sent4: The mysteries of cosmochemistries are as vast as the galaxies themselves.
meanings.sent5: Studying cosmochemistries is like deciphering the secrets of the cosmos.

meanings.definition: The branch of chemistry that deals with the elements and compounds found in outer space.
meanings.sent1: Cosmochemistries explores the unique chemistry of space rocks and dust.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in cosmochemistries investigate the origins of extraterrestrial materials.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes, cosmochemistries feels like solving a space-themed puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The realm of cosmochemistries is a realm of endless possibilities and discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of cosmochemistries lies in unraveling the cosmic building blocks.
